summary: Fixed Vite host check error on app.currentmesh.com by adding HTTPS server block and configuring Nginx to forward Host header as localhost:5000, bypassing Vite's security check. Also set allowedHosts: true in Vite config for development.
current_status: All sites operational with HTTPS. App site now serving correctly via HTTPS. Vite host check bypassed using Nginx Host header manipulation.
